articles.author: DoggertQBones
articles.title: Standard's Top Decks With Innistrad: Crimson Vow - The Winners and Losers of the New Metagame With Full Decklists • Decklists, Premium • MTG Arena Zone - MTG Arena Zone
articles.description: Crimson Vow is out, and with that the fervor of players quickly trying to break the meta once again! Get a leg up from DoggertQBones as he discusses what gained the most from Crimson Vow and what decks missed out alongside 6 complete decklists for you to try!
